column1: Smoque BBQ////I'm a huge fan of BBQ and always make an effort to try new places when I travel for business. If there's BBQ being served
column2: I'll give it a try. Â I've been to the well known "hot spots" such as Austin
column3: Memphis and Kansas City to little known places for BBQ such as Green Bay - and yes
column4: this place loves up to the hype.
